title: elemental icon and ward not sold separately? limited edition?
body: so the elemental lux bundle came out and I just wanted to buy the icon but its not sold separately, is it a limited edition icon/ward ? or will it be sold separately in the future?

replies.body: It looks like the icon is currently available in the bundle.  Per the [Lux FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948-Elementalist-Lux-FAQ), the bundle will be available until December 13 so there is still a bit of time to unlock them.  Hope that helps!
